thread.title: Dave & Kats Paris trip 2017
thread.title_full: Dave & Kats Paris trip 2017 - Review of Hotel d'Orsay - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: davidbJ1770PC
title: Dave & Kats Paris trip 2017
text:
Gem of a hotel. Quirky two person lift became a talking point, spiral stairs would be a challenge to the adventurist to see who could make it to the bottom the quickest.
Brilliant location for Musee D'Orsay.
Easy RER connections from CDG Airport.
Being English, more proper tea and milk in the room would have been the icing on the cake.
Room Tip: Take your own tea bags. See more room tips
